articles.description: The ongoing "gas war" between Russia and Europe rumbles on, with a top German official describing the situation his country faces as "serious."
articles.content:
Germany's Economics Minister Robert Habeck has warned that the country faces a serious energy situation as Russia prepared to reduce gas flows to Europe.
